contentencoded: A surprisingly weak jobs report this morning has investors and economist rethinking our economic recovery. According the the Department of Labor, only 126,000 jobs were created last month — half what economists had expected. More on that. Why Nevada's Supreme Court is facing a funding shortage? The answer might lie in how fast people are driving. Finally, a visit to our national parks and their billion-dollar maintenance costs.
title: PODCAST: March jobs report and our National Parks Service
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, April 3, 2015
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

A surprisingly weak jobs report this morning has investors and economist rethinking our economic recovery. According the the Department of Labor, only 126,000 jobs were created last month — half what economists had expected. More on that. Why Nevada's Supreme Court is facing a funding shortage? The answer might lie in how fast people are driving. Finally, a visit to our national parks and their billion-dollar maintenance costs. 

"}]
description: A look at the latest jobs report and the challenges our National Parks Service face.
teaser: A look at the latest jobs report and the challenges our National Parks Service face.
